The 66th Infantry Division (, 66-ya Pekhotnaya Diviziya) was an infantry formation of the Russian Imperial Army.
Organization
*1st Brigade
**261st Infantry Regiment
**262nd Infantry Regiment
*2nd Brigade
**263rd Infantry Regiment
**264th Infantry Regiment
